body.header: Listen to Zafir's answer to the question "How do you think daily life has changed since the arrival of modern technology?" again. Could he have given a better answer?
body.section:
Watch Zafir again, how many points does he make?
What advice would you give him about making his points more clearly?
Look at the list below:- State each point clearly- Give an example to illustrate each point- Use linking words and phrases, such as "also", or "as well as"- Use a wider vocabulary – perhaps talk about the internet, for example- Make more points- Avoid too much repetition
Can you think of at least three ways in which daily life has changed since the arrival of modern technology? Don't forget to give an example for each one!
